header.gameNote: OUTRIGGER HOTELS RAINBOW CLASSIC AT HONOLULU HI

article.headline: Hawaii 65, S. Utah 48
article.story: HONOLULU -- Hawaii overcame an ugly start to the second half and pulled away to win its season opener 65-48 over Southern Utah on Friday night in the 46th annual Rainbow Classic. The Warriors went more than 9:30 without a field goal early in the second half, watching a 10-point lead turn into a one-point deficit as Southern Utah grabbed its first lead. But a 17-6 run over 5 1/2 minutes, thanks in large part to Roderick Fleming?s nine points in that stretch, re-established Hawaii?s double-digit cushion. Fleming, a senior forward who was an all-Western Athletic Conference second-team performer last season, finished with game highs of 23 points and 12 rebounds. Providence transfer Dwain Williams scored 16 points in his debut with Hawaii. Senior guard Davis Barker led Southern Utah with 14 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
